author: cardinia
body:
#### PR description:
@connorpa @adewit 
Update on the tool for plotting the distribution of the median of residuals for Tracker Alignment:
the tool now can produce the trends for the distribution of the RMS for normalized residuals, and some updates have been set into place for making the tool easier to edit for the phase 2 detector.
Some extra details are available in the following link:
https://indico.cern.ch/event/841672/?showDate=all&showSession=0#40-dmr-trend-tool-virtual
title: Updated tool for Tracker Alignment: DrmsNR trends
